input.sentences: scraps of paper are gathered to create a pinata .
the pinata is designed in the shape of an animal .
it is hung up for the game .
a stick is used to hit the pinata | with the turn taker hoping to be the one to crack it open .
it breaks into pieces after being struck | and remnants of paper land on the floor .
output.sentences: I like to repurpose things and I felt challenged by this pile of pinata paper scraps.
I decided to shape a new pinata, designed to look like a happy, striped kitten.
I hung my new pinata for my little sister's birthday, so it could be a game.
Each taker holds a stick and hits the pinata.
When the pinata is struck, pieces of candy fall out and only the pinata remnants remain.
